title: German apple pie
ingredients: ['300g plain flour', '90g caster sugar', '1 egg', '180g butter, softened', '1 tablespoon cold water (if needed)', 'butter and breadcrumbs for the tin', '500g apples - peeled, cored and chopped', '200g apple sauce', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '80g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', 'Icing (optional)', 'icing sugar', 'lemon juice']
